ATTERBURY GOLDBERGER & WEISS, P.A.
JOSEPH R.ATTERBURY
JACK A. GOLDBERGER
JASON S. WEISS
Board Certified Criminal Trial Attorney
Member of New Jersey & Florida Bars
Barry,
Here is Acosta's number.
let me know what he has to say, because Joy leftkowitz
has to follow up w/a call to him to finalize.
Enclosing some fun reading on your Defenht
Jack
One Clearlake Centre, Suite 1400 250 Australian Avenue South West Palm Beach, FL 33401
P 561.659.8300 f 561.835.8691 www.agwpa.com Public Records Request No. 19-372
DOJ-OGR-00033220
